scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && mkdir build/style && mkdir build/logic && postcss style/*.css --use autoprefixer|minify --css > build/style/main.css && minify index.html > build/index.html && minify logic/index.js > build/logic/index.js && minify logic/mapandstore.js > build/logic/mapandstore.js && cp -R logic/typed_js_lite.min.js build/logic/ && cp -R img build/img
